def fun(n):
    x=dict()
    for i in range(0,n,1):
        a=raw_input()
        b=a.rsplit()
        flag=1
        if b[1]=="+":
            flag=1
        elif b[1]=="-":
            flag=-1
        x[b[0]]=flag
    su=0
    for i in x.keys():
        su+=x[i]
    return su
x=input()
m=list()
for i in range(0,x,1):
    a=input()
    b=fun(a)
    m.append(b)
for i in m:
    print i
